ygData.subject: RE: special instruments
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The Sneak trick does indeed work on Krak.  Our CCC song does nothing noticable, I think it s because Krak has no factions. Krak hates everyone, except a
ygData.messageBody:
>The merch birdie in SK "Krak" hates me or hate half-elfs or
>something. I tried all the tricks, charisma song, stand
>behind and sneak, all of the and he still wont sell to me

The Sneak trick does indeed work on Krak. Our CCC song does
nothing noticable, I think it's because Krak has no factions.
Krak hates everyone, except a few race/class/religion combos.

I buy my throwing daggers from him.

Harmonic Distortion, 39th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
